snippet: A number of apps help users winnow the overwhelming amount of news about hardware and software, serving up content of the greatest interest to them.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares apps designed specifically to allow users to customize filters for technology industry news; recommends Drupe app for Android, which helps users keep track of most-frequently-contacted people.
lead_paragraph: A number of apps help users winnow the overwhelming amount of news about hardware and software, serving up content of the greatest interest to them.

headline.print_headline: Custom Filters to Sift the Torrent of Technology News
headline.main: Video Feature: Custom Filters to Sift the Torrent of Technology News
